description.narrative: This activity (DFID-Brazil international development co-operation) is a component of Global Development Partnership Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Non-budget support financial aid' and a budget of £1,545,760. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Social Protection, Agricultural development, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office, Harewelle International Limited, Overseas Development Institute, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), World Food Programme (WFP). The start date is 01-04-2009 and the end date is 30-09-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
